shutl0w:

1. it is possible to feel things quickly and genuinely and it is possible to move on quickly and genuinely. hearts work in weird ways and short does not mean superficial. length does not mean real. these are constructions. letâs not place emphasis on suffering or call time sublime….

I particularly like:

3. you have a responsibility to take care of yourself and that includes making sure you are happy and whole, which means that yes, you can be selfish if you need to. your body and mental health and needs are valid.

YES. If you’re not ready to, you can’t take care of anyone else, so either you trust them to take care of themselves while you’re working through your stuff/pain, or you take both of you down.
link-text: CAN'T YOU THINK FOR YOURSELF: important things:
